$interpreted: Elder Cleric: High Priest, the one who accompanied you home...was that, Andrew Giuliano Gomez?
Devious: He saved Joshua and I on the road, that's all.
Elder Cleric: Sir, you cannot trust those young clerics' words, no matter what!

Elder Cleric: Speaking of helping the future king or queen, in exchange for future payments to the Shrine...

Such greedy words go against our teaching, they speak of unforgivable sins!
Devious: I have my principles regarding these matters.
Devious: Quiet down, you will frighten the children.
Elder Cleric: I trust that the High Priest will uphold the Shrine's position.
Devious: Joshua, what are you doing?
Joshua: I'm telling her stories, just like you~
Devious: Oh? No wonder she's sleeping so well, hehe. I'm sure she's very happy to have you read her stories before bed.
Joshua: You think she's happy? She's still so small, so teeny-tiny...
Joshua: ...Why don't her parents want her...?
Devious: Her father and mother may not want her, but...the Snake God and the orphanage will take good care of her.
Joshua: We...do we have to go back to the orphanage...?
Devious: She is still so small. In the orphanage, she'll be able to grow up in peace.
Joshua: Yeah...
Devious: However, everyone is so busy at the orphanage, perhaps they are unable...to truly care for every child.
Devious: But you'll help out, won't you?
Joshua: ...Yeah! I'll read her stories, and tuck her in...
Joshua: ...feed her food and play with her. I'll make sure she doesn't feel lonely!
Devious: Hehe, then you can't go sneaking out again.
Devious: Otherwise, when this little girl can't find you, she'll certainly cry...
Joshua: I won't let her cry!
Devious: Wonderful. Now I feel safe leaving her with you.
Devious: I hope the Snake God and Goddess take pity on these two children...
Young Cleric: High Priest, that believer...he is looking for you again.
Devious: That artist who comes every night?
Young Cleric: Yes. He is waiting in front of the sculpture of the Snake God praying, awaiting you.
Devious: He comes to pray at the Shrine everyday. His piety is quite moving, and a rare sight to see.
Devious: It's about time for good children to get to bed.
Devious: Joshua, take her to the bed to rest.
Joshua: Okay! I'll take care of her!
Devious: Invite him in.
Young Cleric: Yes, sir.
Devious: ... *sigh*... Another child, abandoned at the Shrine. The costs of the orphanage are expanding, perhaps I should...
Devious: No, I can't do that. As the High Priest, I must remain just and impartial...!
Devious: Eh?
Devious: The candles...is this some sort of prank?
Devious: Who's laughing!? A man? No...a woman?
Devious: An elder...a child!? More than one!?
Devious: Who's there! Who are you!
Devious: Show yourself! Th-There's an assassin!
Devious: W-What do you want...?
Devious: (This...this isn't my study...)
Devious: (Am...am I dreaming!?)
Devious: Snake God and Goddess!
Devious: Save me! Protect me!
Devious: ──Please protect your faithful believer, Snake God!
Cold Purple-Cloak: He's asking for protection from the Snake God...
Happy Purple-Cloak: It would be better if he kneeled before us~
Cold Purple-Cloak: For the Snake God is nothing more than...
Happy Purple-Cloak: ...the false god of the Dracontines~
Purple-Cloaks: Hee hee hee...hehehe....WAHAHAHA...
Devious: Stop your laughing! Stop it! Who are you!?
Leader: ...If you're so concerned, why don't you see for yourself?
Devious: Y-You──
Devious: ...Me?
Devious: Such an aged body...doesn't seem to be the best choice...
Devious: However, we have no choice. The plan must be carried out.
Devious: Well then, where do we begin?

Model.Text: High Priest, the one who accompanied you home...was that, Andrew Giuliano Gomez?
He saved Joshua and I on the road, that's all.
Sir, you cannot trust those young clerics' words, no matter what!

Speaking of helping the future king or queen, in exchange for future payments to the Shrine...

Such greedy words go against our teaching, they speak of unforgivable sins!
I have my principles regarding these matters.
Quiet down, you will frighten the children.
I trust that the High Priest will uphold the Shrine's position.
Joshua, what are you doing?
I'm telling her stories, just like you~
Oh? No wonder she's sleeping so well, hehe. I'm sure she's very happy to have you read her stories before bed.
You think she's happy? She's still so small, so teeny-tiny...
...Why don't her parents want her...?
Her father and mother may not want her, but...the Snake God and the orphanage will take good care of her.
We...do we have to go back to the orphanage...?
She is still so small. In the orphanage, she'll be able to grow up in peace.
Yeah...
However, everyone is so busy at the orphanage, perhaps they are unable...to truly care for every child.
But you'll help out, won't you?
...Yeah! I'll read her stories, and tuck her in...
...feed her food and play with her. I'll make sure she doesn't feel lonely!
Hehe, then you can't go sneaking out again.
Otherwise, when this little girl can't find you, she'll certainly cry...
I won't let her cry!
Wonderful. Now I feel safe leaving her with you.
I hope the Snake God and Goddess take pity on these two children...
High Priest, that believer...he is looking for you again.
That artist who comes every night?
Yes. He is waiting in front of the sculpture of the Snake God praying, awaiting you.
He comes to pray at the Shrine everyday. His piety is quite moving, and a rare sight to see.
It's about time for good children to get to bed.
Joshua, take her to the bed to rest.
Okay! I'll take care of her!
Invite him in.
Yes, sir.
... *sigh*... Another child, abandoned at the Shrine. The costs of the orphanage are expanding, perhaps I should...
No, I can't do that. As the High Priest, I must remain just and impartial...!
Eh?
The candles...is this some sort of prank?
Who's laughing!? A man? No...a woman?
An elder...a child!? More than one!?
Who's there! Who are you!
Show yourself! Th-There's an assassin!
W-What do you want...?
(This...this isn't my study...)
(Am...am I dreaming!?)
Snake God and Goddess!
Save me! Protect me!
──Please protect your faithful believer, Snake God!
He's asking for protection from the Snake God...
It would be better if he kneeled before us~
For the Snake God is nothing more than...
...the false god of the Dracontines~
Hee hee hee...hehehe....WAHAHAHA...
Stop your laughing! Stop it! Who are you!?
...If you're so concerned, why don't you see for yourself?
Y-You──
Such an aged body...doesn't seem to be the best choice...
However, we have no choice. The plan must be carried out.
Well then, where do we begin?
